title.rendered: Villa Vie Residences Purchases Braemar from Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines

content.rendered:
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla., Dec. 13, 2023 /PRNewswire/ — Villa Vie Residences, an innovative new world cruise brand has purchased the former Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines ship, The Braemar to be named Villa Vie Odyssey. The 924-passenger, 24,344 GRT vessel will enter service in May 2024 following the completion of a multimillion-dollar transformation into a residential cruise ship complete with villas as residences.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/villa-vie-residences-purchases-braemar-from-fred-olsen-cruise-lines-302014081.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com

The 924-passenger, 24,344 GRT vessel will enter service in May 2024 following the completion of a multimillion-dollar transformation into a residential […]
